pages.text: $(o)Like many dimensions we research, when you die in this one you aren't DEAD dead. Just... inconveniently misplaced, I like to call it. $(br2)When you die, a magical Grave is constructed at your death spot, and everything you were carrying is entombed inside it safely.

$(o)You'll also get a cryptic message with the COORDINATES of your Grave. Be sure to remember these!$(br2)You can get a display of your Coordinates by having a Compass in your inventory!$(br2)When back at your grave, just Right Click to open it and retrieve your items.
